author: Barbara B
title: The Best Place to stay in Paris
text:
The hotel is charming and well-located. The staff are are all very helpful. We have stayed there three times in the past twelve months and would not stay anywhere else. The hotel is close to lots of good restaurants.
Room Tip: It is very nice to have a room overlooking the church of St Germain. See more room tips
